segments.text: Janice , the president of our company , Mr Smith , will invite two programmers to give us a lecture this afternoon . Are all the members notified ?
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Yes . I have given all the designers notice of meeting by telephone .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: Is the room ready for the lecture now ?
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Yes , I have prepared . I have also prepared a meeting memo .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: Excellent . How about the microphone and speaker ?
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: I have also got them ready for the lecture .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: Write up the official notice in duplicate . Do not forget to put name cards and pens on the tables for our guests .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: I have prepared name cards to be put on the conference table for everyone to sit by . What time would you like to provide the refreshment ?
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: Well , after the half of the meeting , there will be an interval for rest and refreshment .
segments.speaker: S1
